events.title: Covid-19 Response
events.description: Unfortunately, both the TMR and Robocup Jr. were cancelled for this year, yet we continued working, creating online courses and webinars webinars as well as participating in different tech events.

events.title: Regional 2020
events.description: Diego, Emérico, Marlon and Grecia won 2nd place in Rescue Maze and Keven, Gabriela y Karyme won 3rd place in Soccer Open.

events.title: First committee of Sponsorships and Networking
events.description: A new position in the team opened for students to collaborate in the logistics of sponsorships and networking, as well as social media and image; The opportunity opened for any student of Tec de Monterrey to help us have a more multidisciplinary integration.

events.title: 1st Gen Grad
events.description: Founders Diego, Emilio, Gerardo and Sebastian graduated.

events.title: LARC OPEN 2019
events.description: During the semester, a robot was developed for the LARC IEEE competition, Open category. The robot consisted of an autonomous car with a mechanism to grab metal blocks by means of electromagnets, along with a navigation and vision system to be able to leave the blocks in their corresponding places. In the end, we could not attend due to economic issues.

events.title: Australia
events.description: Arath, Aldo, Jamir and Mauricio obtained the “Best Hardware Solution” award in the RoboCup Jr. Rescue Maze, Sydney Australia.

events.title: TMR 2019
events.description: Arath, Aldo, Jamir y Juan Carlos won 1st place in Rescue Maze Category.

events.title: Regional 2019
events.description: Amin, Chapa, Pasquel and Omar won 1st place in Soccer Light Category.

events.title: Formalization of @Home
events.description: The RoBorregos’ @HOME team was formalized. The team was divided into different technology areas, integrating voice recognition, natural language processing and computer vision with neural networks, navigation, control and mechanical and structural design.

events.title: LARC 2018
events.description: 1st place in Latin American and Brazilian Competition IEEE Open Challenge won by Alexis, Antonio, Ivan, Mariano, and Osvaldo. The robot consisted of an autonomous car with a mechanism to grab metal blocks with magnets, along with a navigation and vision system to be able to leave the blocks in their corresponding places.

events.title: Canada
events.description: Alberto, Greg and Iqui were the first ones to participate in Soccer Open internationally and Jahuey, Itzeld, Osorio and Yulisa participated in Rescue Maze in Montreal, Canada.

events.title: TMR 2018 DRONES
events.description: Alex Garza, Aurora Tijerina, Cristian Bentin and Paul Vazquez won 3rd and was the first time participating in Autonomous Drones Advanced Category, at Tec of Monterrey, Campus Monterrey.

events.title: TMR 2018
events.description: Alberto Jahuey, Itzel López, Ricardo Osorio and Yulisa Farron won 1st Place in Rescue Maze; Alberto López, Greg Espinosa, and Iqui Balam won 2nd in Soccer Open; Eric Uriel, Jesus Anaya, Isaac, Monica Nava and Roberto Galindo won 3rd in Soccer Light.

events.title: LARC 2017
events.description: Alex, Cardozo, Clara, Emilio, Javier and Nestor won 3rd place by a difference of 2pts.

events.title: Japan
events.description: Placing Mexico for the first time in the podium, Tomas, Alexis, Esquer and Ernesto won 3rd place in RoboCup Jr. Rescue Maze, Nagoya, Japan.

events.title: TMR 2017
events.description: Tomas, Esquer and Bernardo won 1st and Mariano, Alexis, Ernesto and Osvaldo won 2nd place in Rescue Maze.

events.title: Regional 2017
events.description: Tomas, Esquer, and Bernardo won 1st place in Rescue Maze. Angel, Ernesto, Gabriela, Ivan and Paul won 3rd place in Soccer Open and Cinthia, Aurora, Ana, Arcelia and Greg won 3rd in Soccer Light.

events.title: LARC 2016
events.description: Diego, Clara, Emilio, Gerardo and Sebastián won 2nd Place in Latin American and Brazilian Competition IEEE Open Challenge.

events.title: Germany
events.description: Javier, Alex, Nestor and Cristian participated in RoboCup Rescue Maze.

events.title: TMR 2016
events.description: 1st and 2nd Place in Rescue Maze TMR 2016, Ciudad Victoria, Tamaulipas, by Javier, Alex, Nestor, Christian, and Tomas, Diego, Enrique, Isabela and Melissa.

events.title: Regional 2016
events.description: Javier, Alex, Nestor and Christian won 1st Place in Rescue Maze Regional. Cinthia, Eduardo, Cardozo and Ian won 1st in Soccer Open.

events.title: Team Foundation
events.description: Team founders decided to create a program to teach the basics of robotics to Tec freshmen and then have an internal competition to find the best fit for the team. This event has become our annual “Candidates”.

events.title: First International
events.description: Diego, Emilio, Gerardo y Sebastián were the first to place Mexico in the Top 10 in RoboCup Jr. Rescue Maze in Hefei, China.

events.title: First Step
events.description: Diego, Emilio, Gerardo y Sebastián won first place in Rescue Maze at TMR 2015, Mexico City.
